channel.title: Wellantscape v4.1 [fixed] (317) 200+ downloads! +delete the lava! tut!
channel.description:
{sorry for my bad english} (i am dutch) the first wellantscape v4.1 whas very bad i know it so i started edditing and this are the resolds
pics: http://wellantscape.webs.com/apps/photos/album?albumid=8892061
Quote {((commands))}
Player commands
::switch
::starter
::home
::fly
::Jump
::jumpoff
::wc
::yell
::food
::dance
::smith
::skills
::rep
::kbd
::mini
::dbmini
::afk
::back
::gsmini
::suggest
Many more just do ::commands
~~~~~~
Mod commands
::kick
::notedbarrows
::az
::1hit
::mute
::unmute
::pring
::spec
::money
::sweet
::modwear
::pure
::god
::alert
::mypk
::alert
::staffeiland 100% made by me
::staffhangout 100% made by me
many more just do ::commands
~~~~~~~
Admin commands
::banuser
::unban
::pnpc
::pickup
::npc
::xteleto
::xteletome
::k0
::money
::god
::adminwear
many more just do ::commands
~~~~~~~~
Owner commands
::ownerwear
::ipban
::staffmeeting
::void
::giveadmin
::givemod
::giveowner
::eat
::update
::demote
many more just do ::commands
what is done: 1. walls tree's and water is now lava {very lol!} 2. fixed npc id list in client. 3. more colours in client. 4. maked ::runes for everyone. (for the noobs) 5. fixed bugs. 6. added 1 more shop. 7. added pest control and castle wars. 8. made lava house at ::lava. 9. made more tele commands like ::lumbridge (almost al city's of rs world). 10. added more zone's jus like a piece of 7. 11. added more npc's by ::kq first only one but now more. 12. changed background, chatbox an all orther stuff. alot more but i forgot it.....
